title: Ellis Island Part of Statue of Liberty National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         Like new arrivals did in the past, take your first step onto Ellis Island.Â  Find photos, explore island history, or see what's currently happening here at Ellis Island! NPS Photo  Looking for more information? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more. News Press releases and park event information. Photos & Multimedia Photos, videos, and links to our social media sites. History & Culture Learn about the people and places that make up our past. Education Plan a class visit, enjoy traveling trunks, and pick up ideas for classroom lessons. Kids & Youth Become a Junior Ranger and learn about the park. Management Park planning, laws and policies, and managing resources.
